text: The Bitter Tears of Petra von Kant () is a 1972 West German drama movie directed by Rainer Werner Fassbinder and based on his own play. It stars Margit Carstensen, Irm Hermann, Hanna Schygulla, Eva Mattes, Gisela Fackeldey and was distributed by New Yorker Films. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1972 drama movies Category:1972 LGBT movies Category:German drama movies Category:German LGBT movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Rainer Werner Fassbinder Category:German-language movies
title: The Bitter Tears of Petra von Kant
